home.hero-content: I'm a developer with an insatiable curiosity, dedicated to crafting outstanding frontend experiences. My coding journey blends a passion for technology with a commitment to problem-solving. I thrive on collaborating with teams to create captivating products. Here, I unite my technical skills and creativity to deliver a unique and impressive digital experience for you. Let's explore, innovate, and inspire together.
home.contact-content: I'm currently looking for full-time opportunities. If you have any questions or would like to get in touch, please feel free to email me at

In charge of developing frontend development of Lumine AI
details: Lumine AI frontend lead for developing the AI chatbot platform

details: Handle research projects on the topic of 3D shoe painting
Develop lab inventory management system through RFID

Algorithm implementation through Java which is refer to Zhang (2015)

Construct internal system with Angular 2, Spring Boot Rest API and using MySQL as data source.
